questiontext.text:
Exercise

Evaluate the following double integral.

\(I=\displaystyle \int_{@aa@}^{@bb@} \displaystyle \int_{@cc@}^{@dd@}st^{3}\, \mathrm{d}s \mathrm{d}t \)

\(I=\) [[input:ans1]] [[validation:ans1]]

If your answer is not an integer, leave it in rational form e.g. 23/5.

generalfeedback.text:
The integration takes place over the rectangle shown below.

[[jsxgraph]] var board = JXG.JSXGraph.initBoard(divid, { boundingbox: [{#smin#}, {#tmax#}, {#smax#}, {#tmin#}], keepaspectratio: true, axis: true, showCopyright: false, showNavigation: false, grid: false }); // Hide tick labels and ticks on x-axis but label it board.defaultAxes.x.setAttribute({ ticks: { drawLabels: false, // hide numbers majorHeight: 0, minorHeight: 0 }, name: 's', withLabel: true, label: { position: 'rt', offset: [1, -10] } }); // Hide tick labels and ticks on y-axis but label it board.defaultAxes.y.setAttribute({ ticks: { drawLabels: false, majorHeight: 0, minorHeight: 0 }, name: 't', withLabel: true, label: { position: 'rt', offset: [-15, 0] } }); // Create points and rectangle var bl = board.create('point', [{#cc#},{#aa#}], {fixed: true, withLabel:false, visible: true, showInfobox: false, size: 3, face: 'o', fillColor: 'black', strokeColor: 'black'}); var br = board.create('point', [{#dd#},{#aa#}], {fixed: true, withLabel:false, visible: true, showInfobox: false, size: 3, face: 'o', fillColor: 'black', strokeColor: 'black'}) var tr = board.create('point', [{#dd#},{#bb#}], {fixed: true, withLabel:false, visible: true, showInfobox: false, size: 3, face: 'o', fillColor: 'black', strokeColor: 'black'}); var tl = board.create('point', [{#cc#},{#bb#}], {fixed: true, withLabel:false, visible: true, showInfobox: false, size: 3, face: 'o', fillColor: 'black', strokeColor: 'black'}); var rectangle = board.create('polygon', [bl, br, tr, tl],{name:"Rectangle",withLabel:false, color: 'white'}); // Set all edges (borders) to black rectangle.borders.forEach(line => { line.setAttribute({strokeColor: 'darkblue'}); }); // Label coordinates dynamically [bl, br, tr, tl].forEach((pt) => { board.create('text', [ () => pt.X() + 0.1, () => pt.Y() + 0.1, () => `(${pt.X()}, ${pt.Y()})` ], { fontSize: 12, fixed: true, highlight: false }); }); [[/jsxgraph]]

We have

\(\qquad \displaystyle I=\displaystyle \int_{@aa@}^{@bb@} \displaystyle \int_{@cc@}^{@dd@}st^{3}\, \mathrm{d}s \mathrm{d}t \)

Computing the inner integral, we get

\(\qquad \displaystyle \int_{@cc@}^{@dd@}st^{3}\, \mathrm{d}s \)

\(\qquad \displaystyle = \left[\dfrac{s^2}{2}t^3\right]_{@cc@}^{@dd@}\)

\(\qquad \displaystyle = \dfrac{{@dd^2@}}{2}t^3 - \dfrac{{@cc^2@}}{2}t^3 \)

\(\qquad \displaystyle = {@t^3*ee@} \)

This can then be put into the outer integral to give

\(\qquad \displaystyle I = \displaystyle \int_{@aa@}^{@bb@} {@t^3*ee@} \, \mathrm{d}t \)

\(\qquad \displaystyle = \displaystyle \left[{@ee*t^4/4@}\right]_{@aa@}^{@bb@} \)

\(\qquad \displaystyle = {@(bb^4/4) * ee@} - \left({@(aa^4/4) * ee@}\right) \)

\(\qquad \displaystyle = {@(bb^4/4) * ee - ((aa^4/4) * ee)@} \)

prtcorrect.text: Correct answer, well done.

prtpartiallycorrect.text: Your answer is partially correct.

prtincorrect.text: Incorrect answer.

qtest.description: Test case assuming the teacher's input gets full marks.
